title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Says It Received Presidential Order To Abandon Proposed Takeover Of Co By Broadcom
text: March 13, 2018 / 1:06 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Qualcomm Says It Received Presidential Order To Abandon Proposed Takeover Of Co By Broadcom Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc: * RECEIVED A PRESIDENTIAL ORDER TO IMMEDIATELY AND PERMANENTLY ABANDON THE PROPOSED TAKEOVER OF QUALCOMM BY BROADCOM LIMITED * ALL OF BROADCOM’S DIRECTOR NOMINEES ARE ALSO DISQUALIFIED FROM STANDING FOR ELECTION AS DIRECTORS OF QUALCOMM * CO ALSO ORDERED TO RECONVENE ITS 2018 ANNUAL MEETING ON EARLIEST POSSIBLE DATE, WHICH BASED ON REQUIRED NOTICE PERIOD, IS MARCH 23, 2018‍​ Further company coverage:
